author: Reuters
title: ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF to undergo 3-for-1 share split on June 16
description: The approval of such spot bitcoin ETFs in January 2024 by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, marked a watershed moment for the digital assets...
content: (Reuters) -21Shares US said on Monday it will carry out a 3-for-1 share split of its ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF to make the fund more accessible to investors, with the move set to take effect at market… [+1182 chars]
